name: "Boss" Fight
description:
You've been called in to the boss's office.  Hopefully everything's ok, or a fight might break out.  Good thing you brought along an unlimited supply of staplers!

  • "WASD" to move
  • "L Shift" to use your shield, but don't let it run out of charge
  • Mouse to aim and shoot

You have 5 health, and 2 seconds of shield which takes a long time to recharge.  The pillars do not work as cover.  Apologies for much placeholder content, life happens.

I'm "Zee-Only-One", but you can call me Z.
